communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: I'm about to leave my sheltered life at a Catholic high school in New England for a very liberal college. This transition is daunting as I've been raised in a very conservative environment. My dating failures and the resentment I feel towards women and society have only grown. I plan to raise hell and sew my wild oats at college, challenging the social hierarchy that I believe has wronged me.
narratives.p_intro: Meet incel_0026_6bd82b, an angry and confrontational 17-year-old from New England. He's about to transition from a Catholic high school to a liberal college, carrying with him deep-seated resentment towards women and society due to his dating failures. He's ready to challenge the social hierarchy and 'raise hell' in his new environment.
